attributes.action: Set up an inquiry to investigate the standard of marking and mark schemes from Edexcel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the debacle of a few years ago, Edexcel has been regarded as incompetent. I am a student who is taking my GCSEs this year, and I, quite honestly, am frustrated with the standards of the Edexcel mark schemes. One must jump through numerous hoops, but these hoops are moved, or shrunk in diameter to suit THEIR needs. I therefore ask the PM to investigate the appropriateness of Edexcel.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/A-levelReform/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
